description: This file defines the interface for a Data Model Library related to UPnP objects within a Cocos-based system. It includes function declarations for getting and setting device parameters, validation, commit and rollback procedures, as well as functions for capabilities management. The file primarily consists of function prototypes and include directives, serving as a header for UPnP device management APIs.

methods.name: Device_GetParamBoolValue
methods.description: Retrieves a boolean parameter value for a device.

methods.name: Device_GetParamIntValue
methods.description: Retrieves an integer parameter value for a device.

methods.name: Device_GetParamUlongValue
methods.description: Retrieves an unsigned long parameter value for a device.

methods.name: Device_GetParamStringValue
methods.description: Retrieves a string parameter value for a device.

methods.name: Device_SetParamBoolValue
methods.description: Sets a boolean parameter value for a device.

methods.name: Device_SetParamIntValue
methods.description: Sets an integer parameter value for a device.

methods.name: Device_SetParamUlongValue
methods.description: Sets an unsigned long parameter value for a device.

methods.name: Device_SetParamStringValue
methods.description: Sets a string parameter value for a device.

methods.name: Device_Commit
methods.description: Commits changes to the device's configuration.

methods.name: Device_Rollback
methods.description: Rolls back changes to the device's configuration.

methods.name: Capabilities_GetParamUlongValue
methods.description: Retrieves an unsigned long capability parameter.
